description: This is a JavaScript source file that sets up and renders the React root component for the application, integrating React and ReactDOM for rendering, and importing the main App component along with a CSS stylesheet.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for React rendering in the specified DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree inside the root element, using StrictMode and the App component.
